org.strabil.math
Class Beta

java.lang.Object
  org.strabil.math.Beta

public class Beta
extends java.lang.Object

In mathematics, the beta function, also called the Euler integral of the first kind, is a special function defined by for .

The implementation of the algorithm was inspired by "Numerical Recipes in C", 2nd edition, Press, Teukolsky, Vetterling, Flannery, chapter 6.

Author:
Dominik Holenstein
See Also:
Beta function on Wikipedia, Numerical Recipes in C, Chapter 6.1 (PDF, 58 KB)
